title: Create personalized "The Shining" typewriter pages
content:
Create and print personalized typewriter-style pages, like Jack did in "The Shining", using this website:  
 [http://toys.usvsth3m.com/shine-o-matic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417194318/http:/toys.usvsth3m.com/shine-o-matic/ "http://toys.usvsth3m.com/shine-o-matic/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417194318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/The-Shining_3638.jpg)

(found via Gizmodo.com)
author: JamesM
